osyfe.gui

Class GUIOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.gui.GUIOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Overlay

    public final class GUIOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay
    A customizable GUI overlay with all methods implemented. The GUI becomes deactivated when clicking somewhere outside. While deactivated, it passes all input events down.
    The GUI is organized in windows which contain rows, which in turn contain widgets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIOverlay(GUIFont gui_font)
      Creates a new GUI overlay using the given GUI font.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Window win)
      Adds the given window to the GUI.
      void clean()
      Is called once when the overlay is removed from the Screen.
      void input(InputEvent event)
      Is called for every input event that reaches this overlay.
      void logic(float dt)
      Is called every game loop iteration with the past time in seconds.
      void remove(Window win)
      Removes the given window from the GUI.
      void render()
      Is called every game loop iteration.
      void setAFactor(float a)
      Sets the color factor for the deactivated GUI.
      void setRGBAFactor(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Sets the color factor for the deactivated GUI.
      void setRGBFactor(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets the color factor for the deactivated GUI.
      void setup()
      Is called once when the overlay is added to the Screen.
